column1: Little Goat Diner////I love Little Goat! With such a creative menu filled with unique brunch choices
column2: you would never think that their best item on the menu would be their bagels.  From the restaurant side
column3: the bagels are hardly advertised and neither are their amazing smears. I might bring an out of town friend to come and try the traditional sit down menu for brunch or lunch
column5: the best part of this restaurant is their bakery.  From fresh baked breads
column8: I can't find a more delectable bagel anywhere in Chicago.  Come and try everything
column9: but if you're on a budget
column10: just come to the bakery attached to the restaurant and get an awesome coffee and bagel + smear. You WILL NOT regret it!!!!
